job.title: Software Engineer, Framework Engineering
job.description: the framework engineering team builds the internal platform abstractions and apis that power all parts of the asana web application from core ui components client performance libraries to data loading apis these frameworks empower product engineers to easily build highlyreactive and fast product features at scaleltbrgtltbrgtwere looking for a software engineer to help make our engineering team move even faster youll use your engineering experience to identify points of friction and design new approaches which are easier and safer to use youll create new apis balancing
